definition: benzothiophene C8H9, a heterocyclic compound (with one benzene ring and one cyclopentene ring)

sentences.english: The thiophene hydrodesulfurization was adopted to evaluate the activity of the nitride catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 用噻吩加氫脫硫反應評定了催化劑的性能。

sentences.english: The scheme initially involves acylation of thiophene using a carboxylic acid to afford the acyl thiophene.
sentences.chinese: 這條路線是先用羧酸使噻吩已酰化製得酸基噻吩。

sentences.english: The scheme initially involves acylation of thiophene using a carboxylic acid to afford the acyl thiophene.
sentences.chinese: 這條路線是先用羧酸使噻吩已酰化製得酸基噻吩。

sentences.english: Thiophene polymers is one of the most intensively investigated functional polymers.
sentences.chinese: 噻吩類聚合物是研究較爲廣泛的功能高分子材料。

sentences.english: Wow thiophene , with as good as new.
Objective To establish the bacterial endotoxin test method for cefalotin sodium for injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立注射用頭孢噻吩鈉的細菌內毒素檢查法。

sentences.english: The method of removal of thiophene in coking benzene and lightbenzene by chloromethylation is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用氯甲基化脫除焦化苯及輕苯中噻吩的方法。

sentences.english: Whatever, thiophenines can be adopted to sensitizers as an electron donor.
sentences.chinese: 但同時也證明了噻吩胺可以作爲光敏染料的電子供體。

sentences.english: The distribution experiment showed that the thifensulfuron-methyl hydrolysis enzyme in the bacterium was endoenzyme.
sentences.chinese: 酶的定域實驗表明，該菌中噻吩磺隆水解酶爲胞內酶。

sentences.english: Methods To calculate the bacterial endotoxin limit of cefalotin sodium for injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立注射用頭孢噻吩鈉的細菌內毒素檢查法。

sentences.english: New technologies of adsorption desulfurization for thiophene and its derivations were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 概述了吸附法脫除噻吩類有機硫工藝的研究進展。

sentences.english: Thiophene derivatives substituted at β position exhibit special activities, they are mainly used for synthesizing pharmaceuticals and pesticides.
sentences.chinese: 噻吩衍生物有特殊的活性，主要用於合成醫藥和農藥。

definition: cyan/cyanide radical -CN, stable triple bond with chemical properties like halogens
